name: The Blue Stars (demo)
description:
You are the Prince of Earth.

Your Kingdom has been sacked by an invading alien force known as the Sarjonians.

You have been taken to safety by a small group of Earth knights.

After learning that your father, the King of Earth himself, will be executed in less than a week you all set out for a desperate attempt to save your father and liberate the planet.

To prevail in your quest you will need to recruit and bond with those willing to help your cause, be they alien, human, machine or something that's yet to be understood...

beefjack.dev.business@gmail.com - For inquiries, bug reports and general feed back

@BlueStarsDev is a Twitter you can follow for updates and preview images
